name: Tale of Păianjen
description:
The local population surrounding a forest has been reporting mysterious deaths for a while. They blame these mysterious disappearances on a creature they call "Păianjen". Local law enforcement has not been able to solve a single disappearance connected to this forest. Thus they called on you for aid, use your anomaly detection technology to find and photograph the any anomalies you find. But be wary of Păianjen or you will be the next unsolved mystery. The locals report strange sounds in some places of the forest, use this information as you will.

Controls:

WASD - move

Shift - sprint

Left click - take picture

Right click - use anomoly detection camera (only lasts a short time).
